text: Charles Cuthbert Powell Williams, Baron Williams of Elvel, (9 February 1933 â€“ 30 December 2019) was a British businessman, cricketer and Labour life peer. He was a member of the House of Lords from 1985 until his death. In his 20s he played first-class cricket while at university and for several seasons afterwards. He was the stepfather of Justin Welby, the Archbishop of Canterbury. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:English and Welsh cricketers Category:English businesspeople Category:People from Oxford Category:Sportspeople from Oxfordshire Category:Labour Life Peers Category:Politicians from Oxfordshire
title: Charles Williams, Baron Williams of Elvel
